t: Vindicate*pn me, O Lord,*s for*ld I have walked in my integrity, and*ld I have trusted in the Lord*s without wavering.
Prove*ln me, O Lord,*s and try me; test*ld my heart and my mind.
For*ln your steadfast love is before my eyes, and*ld I walk in your faithfulness.
I*pn do not sit with men of falsehood, nor*ld do I consort with hypocrites.
I*ln hate the assembly of evildoers, and*ld I will not sit with the wicked.
I*pn wash my hands in innocence and*ld go around your altar, O Lord,*s
proclaiming*ln thanksgiving aloud, and*ld telling all your wondrous deeds.
O*pn Lord,*s I love the habitation of your house and*ld the place where your glory dwells.
Do*ln not sweep my soul away with sinners, nor*ld my life with bloodthirsty men,
in*ln whose hands are evil devices, and*ld whose right hands are full of bribes.
But*pn as for me, I shall walk in my integrity; redeem*ld me, and be gracious to me.
My*ln foot stands on level ground; in*ld the great assembly I will bless the Lord.*s
